page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: Mr. Sid Corp MR.Corp owns his farm of 300 acres jointly with brother Arthur. He intends to keep the farm in the family and employs his sons to work for him. The farm is situated either side of the B3098 being a mixture of flat and sloped ground, the steepest slopes being covered in deciduous trees.The majority of the land is used for pasture for 104 Beef cattle,70 milk cows, 30 calves, 2 bulls, 120 pigs,70 sheep, 4 horses and 2 goats,although 63 acres are ploughed for corn,and 7 acres for root crops,the latter being used mainly for cattle feed during the winter.Modern equipment is now used for all work.Most farms in the area are similar to Mr.Corp's,in land use and family tradition.
